trans-unit.source: Provides information about speech recognition events.
The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property obtains the recognition information as a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> Eigenschaft Plattforminformationen der Erkennungsvorgang als ein <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> Objekt.

trans-unit.source: For more information about speech recognition events, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen zu Speech Recognition-Ereignissen finden Sie unter [mit Spracherkennung Recognition Ereignissen](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: **RecognitionEventArgs** is the base for the following classes:
trans-unit.target: **RecognitionEventArgs** ist die Grundlage für die folgenden Klassen:

trans-unit.source: The following example attaches a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> events of the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel fügt einen Handler für das <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> Ereignisse von der von der Spracherkennung.

trans-unit.source: The event argument types for the three events all derive from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>, which is used as the event data parameter in the handler.
trans-unit.target: Die Ereignisargumenttypen für alle drei Ereignisse abgeleitet <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>, der als Parameter für das Daten in den Handler verwendet wird.

trans-unit.source: Gets the recognition result data associated with the speech recognition event.
trans-unit.target: Ruft die Erkennungsergebnisdaten ab, die dem Spracherkennungsereignis zugeordnet werden.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result" /> property returns the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" /> that contains the information about the recognition.
trans-unit.target: Die Eigenschaft <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result" /> gibt das <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" /> zurück, das die Informationen über die Erkennung enthält.
